creator: paul@sparrow-hawk.org
text:
Most XSLT processors allow the user to start the transformation in a specific
mode (include saxon and xalan).  It would be very useful if the xslt ant task
allowed one to specify a mode as well.
I don't see a way how to set the invokation mode via the javax.xml.transform interfaces.  Ant doesn't use the command line of either transformer.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
